title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item for the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected for the first time.

OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

EB: The selected item in the library outline view should be highlighted and the focus should not jump to the library file node.

SR: Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view for the first time.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
